output_module.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Module to output data for test_cases.f90 to data files in the form:
00003 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number".dat
00004 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number"P.dat
00005 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_conv.dat
00006 !******************************************************************************
00007 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00008 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90            *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00009 ! POLY_FIT_MOD.F90              *CONTAINS SUBROUTINES TO OUTPUT DATA
00010 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90         *ONTAINS VARIABLES USED IN THE PROGRAM
00011 ! RUNGE_KUTTA.F90               *CONTAINS RK CONSTANTS
00012 !******************************************************************************
00013 
00014       module  output_module
00015 
00016       use precision_vars,    only : wp
00017 
00018       implicit none; save
00019       
00020       public :: create_file_paths, output_names, init_output_files
00021       public :: output_conv_stiff,output_terminal_iteration
00022       public :: output_terminal_final,output_conv_error
00023       
00024       private
00025       character(len=80)            :: fileloc   !file  location
00026       character(len=4), parameter  :: ext='.dat'  !file extension
00027 
00028       contains
00029       
00030 !==============================================================================
00031 !  SETS FILE LOCATION VARIABLE
00032       subroutine set_file_loc()
00033       
00034       use control_variables, only : temporal_splitting,probname
00035       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00036       
00037       fileloc=trim(temporal_splitting)//'/'// &
00038      &        trim(probname)//'/'//trim(casename)//'/' ! get file location  
00039       
00040       end subroutine set_file_loc           
00041       
00042 !==============================================================================
00043 !  CHECKS AND CREATES FILE PATHS FOR OUTPUTS
00044       subroutine create_file_paths()
00045       
00046       logical           :: dirExists   !check if directory exists
00047       
00048       call set_file_loc
00049       inquire( file=trim(fileloc)//'/.', exist=dirExists ) 
00050       if (.not.dirExists)call system('mkdir -p '//trim(fileloc)) 
00051        
00052       end subroutine create_file_paths
00053       
00054 !==============================================================================  
00055 !  WRITES PROBLEM NAME AND CASE NAME TO THE TOP OF THE TERMIINAL OUTPUT
00056       subroutine output_names()
00057 
00058       use control_variables, only : probname
00059       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00060        
00061       write(*,*)'Problem name: ',trim(probname)
00062       write(*,*)'Casename: ', trim(casename)
00063        
00064       end subroutine output_names
00065        
00066 !==============================================================================
00067 !  INITIALIZE OUTPUT FILES FOR ERROR OUTPUTS
00068       subroutine init_output_files(nveclen,ep)
00069 
00070       use control_variables, only : probname
00071       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00072      
00073       integer,  intent(in) :: nveclen
00074       real(wp), intent(in) :: ep
00075       character(len=80)    :: filename   !file name and location
00076       character(len=1)     :: istr        !loop index placeholder
00077       integer              :: i
00078           
00079       if(nveclen <= 9) then
00080         do i = 1,nveclen
00081           write(istr,"(I1.1)")i
00082           filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_'//istr//ext
00083           open(49+i,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00084           write(49+i,*)'zone T = "ep = ',ep,'",'
00085           filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_'//istr//'P'//ext
00086           open(59+i,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00087           write(59+i,*)'zone T = "ep = ',ep,'",'
00088         enddo
00089       endif
00090 
00091       end subroutine init_output_files
00092       
00093 !==============================================================================      
00094 !  OUTPUTS DATA TO CONVERGENCE VS. STIFFNESS FILE
00095       subroutine output_conv_stiff(nveclen,epsave)
00096       
00097       use control_variables, only : temporal_splitting,probname,jactual, &
00098      &                              b1save,b1Psave  
00099       use runge_kutta,       only : casename    
00100       
00101       integer,                intent(in) :: nveclen
00102       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in) :: epsave
00103       
00104       integer           :: i,j
00105       character(len=80) :: filename   !file name and location
00106       
00107       filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_conv'//ext
00108       
00109       open(35,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00110       do i=1,nveclen
00111         write(35,*)'zone T = "Var ',i,': ',trim(temporal_splitting),'",'
00112         do j=1,jactual
00113           write(35,50)epsave(j),b1save(j,i)
00114         enddo
00115           write(35,*)'zone T = "Var ',i,': Predicted",'
00116         do j=1,jactual
00117           write(35,50)epsave(j),b1Psave(j,i)
00118         enddo
00119       enddo
00120 
00121       50 format( 10(e12.5,1x))
00122          
00123       end subroutine output_conv_stiff
00124 
00125 !==============================================================================
00126 !  OUTPUTS ITERATION INFORMATION TO TERMINAL      
00127       subroutine output_terminal_iteration(cost,mwt,ep,nveclen)
00128       
00129       use poly_fit_mod,      only : fit
00130       use control_variables, only : isamp,dt_error_tol,b,error,errorP
00131             
00132       real(wp), dimension(:),   intent(in) :: cost
00133 
00134       integer,                  intent(in) :: mwt
00135       real(wp),                 intent(in) :: ep
00136       integer,                  intent(in) :: nveclen
00137       
00138       real(wp), dimension(nveclen*2) :: a,siga1,sigb1,chi2
00139       real(wp)                       :: q
00140       integer                        :: i,j
00141       integer                        :: jsamp
00142       real(wp), dimension(isamp)     :: sig
00143       
00144       sig(:)=0.0_wp
00145 
00146 
00147       !**GATHER OUTPUT VALUES
00148 
00149       do i = 1,nveclen
00150         do j=2,size(error(:,i))
00151           jsamp=j
00152           if (error(j,i)<=log10(dt_error_tol)) exit
00153         enddo
00154  
00155         call fit(cost,error(:,i),jsamp,sig,mwt,a(i),b(i),                  &
00156      &           siga1(i),sigb1(i),chi2(i),q)
00157         call fit(cost,errorP(:,i),jsamp,sig,mwt,a(i+nveclen),b(i+nveclen), &
00158      &           siga1(i+nveclen),sigb1(i+nveclen),chi2(i+nveclen),q)   
00159       enddo
00160 
00161       !**OUTPUT TO TERMINAL**
00162       write(*,60,advance="no")ep
00163         do i = 1,nveclen*2-1
00164           write(*,60,advance="no")a(i),b(i)
00165         enddo
00166       write(*,60)a(nveclen*2),b(nveclen*2)
00167 
00168    60 format( e12.5,1x,12(f8.3,1x))
00169    
00170       end subroutine output_terminal_iteration
00171 
00172 !==============================================================================
00173 !  OUTPUTS FINAL DATA BLOCK TO TERMINAL. ITERATION INFORMATION
00174       subroutine output_terminal_final(icount,jcount,stageE,stageI,maxiter)
00175       
00176       use runge_kutta, only : ns
00177       
00178       integer,                intent(in   ) :: icount,jcount
00179       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: stageE,stageI,maxiter
00180       
00181       real(wp) :: tmp
00182       integer  :: i
00183       
00184       tmp = 1.0_wp*icount/jcount
00185       write(*,*)'average iterations per step',tmp
00186              
00187       stageE(2:) = (ns-1)*stageE(2:)/jcount
00188       stageI(2:) = (ns-1)*stageI(2:)/jcount
00189 
00190       write(*,*)'error of initial guess is '
00191       do i = 2,ns
00192         write(*,*) i,stageE(i),maxiter(i),stageI(i)
00193       enddo
00194       
00195       end subroutine output_terminal_final
00196 
00197 !==============================================================================
00198 !  OUTPUTS CONVERGENCE AND ERROR DATA TO FILES INITIALIZED EARILER
00199       subroutine output_conv_error(cost)
00200       
00201       use control_variables, only : uvec,uexact,errvecT
00202       
00203       real(wp),               intent(in) :: cost
00204       
00205       integer  :: i
00206       real(wp) :: tmp
00207   
00208       if (size(uvec)<=9) then
00209         do i = 1,size(uvec)
00210           tmp=abs(uvec(i)-uexact(i))
00211           if (tmp==0.0_wp)tmp=1.0e-15_wp
00212           write(49+i,*)cost,log10(tmp)
00213           write(59+i,*)cost,log10(errvecT(i))
00214         enddo
00215       endif
00216       
00217       end subroutine output_conv_error
00218 
00219 !==============================================================================
00220       end module output_module
